```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggthemes)

```

with num 
```{R}
kd<-read.csv("./benchmark/script/my_kd.csv",header=TRUE)
cgal<-read.csv("./benchmark/script/cgal.csv",header=TRUE)
t<-kd %>% bind_rows(cgal)
```

```{R}
byDim<-t %>% 
    group_by(solver,benchType,dims) %>%
    summarise(avg=mean(queryTime, na.rm=FALSE),.groups="drop") 

byDim<- byDim %>% 
    filter(benchType=='craft')  %>%
    select(solver, dims, avg)

byDim
```

```{R}
byNodes <- t %>%
    group_by(solver, benchType, nodes) %>%
    summarise(avg=mean(queryTime, na.rm=FALSE),.groups="drop") 

byNodes<- byNodes %>% 
    filter(benchType=='craft')  %>%
    select(solver, nodes, avg)

byNodes
```

plot the dim graph
```{R}
ggplot(byDim, aes(x = dims, y = avg, color = solver,shape = solver))+
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  geom_line() 
```

plot the node graph
```{R}
ggplot(byNodes, aes(x = nodes, y = avg, color = solver, shape = solver))+
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  geom_line() 
```
